Items.Title: Application no. 20055423 HAK, an Urban Development Action Area Project located at 289, 287, 285, 281 and 277 MacDougal Street, Council District no. 37, Borough of Brooklyn. Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY
A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to authorizing the department of transportation to extend the date of the operating authority of certain subsidized private bus services.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: DOT to extend the date of the operating authority of certain subsidized private bus services.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to authorizing the department of transportation to extend the date of the operating authority of certain subsidized private bus services.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: DOT to extend the date of the operating authority of certain subsidized private bus services.
